State of the Union address to propose cuts in Social Security.`` I hope that information is wrong and that you will stand by your campaign promises to strengthen Social Security,'' read the letter from Sen. Bernie Sanders . I urge you once again to make it clear to the American people that under your watch we will not cut Social Security benefits, raise the retirement age or privatize this critical program.
